thread.title: MovieNews Watch: Pixar mark their 20th year by releasing this Best Friends montage...

author: Sheena McGinley
title: MovieNews Watch: Pixar mark their 20th year by releasing this Best Friends montage...
text:
Pixar are bringing you all the fuzzy feels this Friday morning.
By way of celebrating their 20th year of making us smile, guffaw and cry (damn you, Toy Story 3) the people at Pixar have posted the below montage of enduring friendships. Despite adversity, rocky starts, and severe bouts of memory loss, friendship is the one solid thing *dabs eyes*
That and they got to promote their pending release - The Good Dinosaur - in the process.
MORE: Pixar have released schedule for the next five years, including Toy Story, Finding Dory and more
MORE: The entertainment.ie Pixar Quiz
MORE: Watch: New trailer for Disney-Pixar's 'The Good Dinosaur' brings all the emotions
